verses.verse: And he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> hath taken <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was our <S%H1>father's;<s%> and of that <S%H4480>which<s%> <S%H834><s%> was our <S%H1>father's<s%> hath he <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> him as <S%H8543>before.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and to thy <S%H4138>kindred;<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H6629>flock,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> me as <S%H8543>before;<s%> <S%H8032><s%> but the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me.
And <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3581>power<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

And your <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H2048>deceived<s%> me, and <S%H2498>changed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times;<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>suffered<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H5978><s%> me.

If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> The <S%H5348>speckled<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H7939>wages;<s%> then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H5348>speckled:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> The <S%H6124>ringstreaked<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thy <S%H7939>hire;<s%> then <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>ringstreaked.<s%>
Thus <S%H430>God<s%> hath taken <S%H5337>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> them to me.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3179>conceived,<s%> that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leaped<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H6124>ringstreaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>grizzled.<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> saying, <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leap<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are <S%H6124>ringstreaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>grizzled:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> unto thee.

I <S%H595><s%> am the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H4886>anointedst<s%> the <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H5087>vowedst<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto me: <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> get thee <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4138>kindred.<s%>

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Is there <S%H5750>yet<s%> any <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us in our <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>

Are we <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2803>counted<s%> of him <S%H5237>strangers?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H4376>sold<s%> us, and hath quite <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H3701>money.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5337>taken<s%> from our <S%H4480>father,<s%> <S%H1><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is ours, and our <S%H1121>children's:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> then, <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H6213>do.<s%>
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H5375>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1581>camels;<s%>

And he carried <S%H5090>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7399>goods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>gotten,<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of his <S%H7075>getting,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in <S%H6307>Padan-aram,<s%> for to <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1494>shear<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8655>images<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were her <S%H1>father's.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> stole <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3820>unawares<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in <S%H5921>that<s%> he <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H1097>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1272>fled.<s%>

So <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had; and he rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H1272>fled.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey;<s%> and they <S%H1692>overtook<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H6435>that<s%> thou <S%H1696>speak<s%> not <S%H5973>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H4480>good<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%>

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5381>overtook<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8628>pitched<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H8628>pitched<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done,<s%> that thou hast stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3824>unawares<s%> to me, and carried <S%H5090>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> as <S%H7617>captives<s%> taken with the <S%H2719>sword?<s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> didst thou flee <S%H2244>away<s%> <S%H1272>secretly,<s%> and steal <S%H1589>away<s%> from me; and didst <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, that I might have sent thee <S%H7971>away<s%> with <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> and with <S%H7892>songs,<s%> with <S%H8596>tabret,<s%> and with <S%H3658>harp?<s%>

And hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5203>suffered<s%> me to <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters?<s%> thou hast <S%H6258>now<s%> done <S%H5528>foolishly<s%> in so <S%H6213>doing.<s%>

It <S%H3426>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H7451>hurt:<s%> but the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me last <S%H570>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take thou <S%H8104>heed<s%> that thou <S%H4480>speak<s%> <S%H1696><s%> not <S%H5973>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H4480>good<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> though thou wouldest needs be <S%H1980>gone,<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou sore <S%H3700>longedst<s%> <S%H3700><s%> after thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> yet <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> hast thou <S%H1589>stolen<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H430>gods?<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I was <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Peradventure<s%> thou wouldest take by <S%H1497>force<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> me.

With <S%H5973><s%> <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> thou <S%H4672>findest<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H430>gods,<s%> let him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> thou <S%H4100>what<s%> is thine <S%H5973>with<s%> me, and <S%H3947>take<s%> it to thee. For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and into <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and into the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H519>maidservants'<s%> <S%H168>tents;<s%> but he <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%> Then <S%H3318>went<s%> he out of Leah's <S%H4480>tent,<s%> <S%H168><s%> <S%H3812><s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Now <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8655>images,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H1581>camel's<s%> <S%H3733>furniture,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them. And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H4959>searched<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> but <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H1>father,<s%> Let it <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2734>displease<s%> <S%H5869><s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1870>custom<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> is upon me. And he <S%H2664>searched,<s%> but <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8655>images.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> and <S%H7378>chided<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is my <S%H6588>trespass?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast so hotly <S%H1814>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me?

Whereas <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H4959>searched<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff?<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H3541>here<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> that they may <S%H3198>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us <S%H8147>both.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have <S%H595>I<s%> been <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; thy <S%H7353>ewes<s%> and thy she <S%H5795>goats<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> cast their <S%H7921>young,<s%> and the <S%H352>rams<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%> have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

That which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> of beasts I <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee; <S%H595>I<s%> bore the <S%H2398>loss<s%> of it; of my <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> didst thou <S%H1245>require<s%> it, whether <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> or <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Thus I <S%H1961>was;<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H2721>drought<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> me, and the <S%H7140>frost<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H5074>departed<s%> from mine <S%H4480>eyes.<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

Thus <S%H2088><s%> have I been <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house;<s%> I <S%H5647>served<s%> thee <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for thy <S%H6629>cattle:<s%> and thou hast <S%H2498>changed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times.<s%>

Except <S%H3884><s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> with me, <S%H3588>surely<s%> thou hadst sent me <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7387>empty.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3198>rebuked<s%> thee last <S%H570>night.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> These <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and these <S%H1121>children<s%> are my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and these <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are my <S%H6629>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> is mine: and <S%H4100>what<s%> can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto <S%H428>these<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> unto their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H3205>born?<s%>
